titleStmt.title: The last summons, or an oration sent to the inhabitants of the towne of Rochell, to mooue them to yeild the towne vnto his Maiestie, and to obay his commandements. Written by Monsieur le Marquis de Berguille
titleStmt.author: Bergeville, Marquis de.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
